title: Conduct a Legal Review of an Investigative Piece
description: Before publishing a sensitive investigative story that names individuals, an editor must have it reviewed by the legal department for libel risk.

tasks.description: Flag the completed draft for legal review in the workflow system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The story is marked as needing legal review.

tasks.description: Share the draft and all supporting documentation (interview notes, source documents) with the legal department via a secure channel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The legal team receives all necessary materials for their review.

tasks.description: Receive feedback from the legal team and work with the reporter to make any required changes to mitigate risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is revised based on legal advice.
